intro.dialog_rand2: I wasn't expecting to see you again so soon.

intro.dialog: Since you're here, I can tell you-

intro.dialog_rand1: |shake|You made me feel so loved that all my stuff tastes like garbage now!
intro.dialog_rand2: |shake|All my stuff tastes like trash now, because you made me feel so loved!

intro.dialog_rand1: I was just about to throw it all away.
intro.dialog_rand2: I was just about to get rid of it.

intro.dialog_rand1: I'm going to make you take it instead!
intro.dialog_rand2: Now YOU have to take it!
intro.dialog_rand3: I'm giving it to you now!

comment_take_normal.dialog: Please take this away from me and put it to good use.

comment_take_unknown.dialog: I don't even know what this is anymore!

comment_quick_limit.dialog: Even I wouldn't burden you with all that.

another_gift_1.dialog: Oh no,   we're not done yet!

another_gift_1.dialog_rand1: These things also scare me now.
another_gift_1.dialog_rand2: These things also taste bad now.
another_gift_1.dialog_rand4: I don't like these things anymore.

another_gift_1.dialog: I'm making you take one of them!

leave_blank.dialog: I think it's time for detox.
Great! Now I know how good this feels.
How am I supposed to be the Venom    Veyeral    anymore?

leave_defect.dialog: Taking these things from me is the least you can do after making me feel so nice.
Now you know how I feel!|!||L|Ever since I got these powers, I can't even indulge in a little self deprecation anymore.
And Blue has it even worse!
I was cursed with the inability to have any flaws whatsoever.
|wave|Wow, you both have it so much worse than me.

leave_twins.dialog: Sunshine! I can't believe you made her feel like that.|!| How are you going to make this right?
Would a little kiss be okay?
I guess that can START to make it up to me.

leave_devil.dialog: You can trust me, The Devil, with all your burdens.
I'm gunna use these to knock some sense into the other monsters.
Is my garbage really that helpful?
Sure!     If it comes from the heart, I can use any random trash to make you feel loved.

leave_default.dialog: Taking those is the least you can do after making me feel so nice.
|wave|I guess I can forgive you now.
